snippet.title: SteamWorld Telegraph: Special Broadcast (4K)
snippet.description:
Catch the SteamWorld Telegraph: Special Broadcast in glorious 4K and relive the moment when we announced SteamWorld: Build. 

🕹️ Play the demo 🕹️
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2134770 
GOG.com: https://www.gog.com/game/steamworld_build_demo
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/steamworld-build-71ee6c

📃 Wishlist 📃
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2134770 
GOG.com: https://www.gog.com/game/steamworld_build
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/steamworld-build-71ee6c
PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10004497 

😍 Follow  @SteamWorldGames  😍
Twitter: https://twitter.com/steamworldgames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/steamworldgames/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/steamworldgames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@steamworldgames
Discord: https://discord.gg/WXzhHwB7sw
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@SteamWorldGames
